articles.content: And on it goes. There are Tony Award winners on Broadway and Harry Styles is playing at Madison Square Gardens, but the hottest ticket in New York right now is to watch a 40-year-old woman trying not… [+7077 chars]

articles.title: DAN WOOTTON: We can now ignore David Beckham's virtue signalling after Qatar propaganda - Daily Mail
articles.description: DAN WOOTTON: In social media posts, you have declared yourself a feminist, a gay rights champion and a humanitarian who cares about those mistreated in the third world.
articles.content:
Try for just one moment to transport yourself into the pea-sized brain of David Beckham.
